fields.function: return '2017'
fields.name: Version

fields.function: return source.stay.cis_fid/100
fields.name: FID

fields.function: var resp = source.survey_response.response; var mzp = source.survey_response.response.Erhebungszeitpunkt; if (mzp === '2') {return resp['ASCIBelastung[ESCIB1]']} else {return resp['ESCIBelastung[ESCIB1]']};
